title: Pixel 2 not working with android auto
content:
#1
naash89 

i have a pixel 2 with android P installed with March security patch, but i cant get it to work with android auto. i have tried different cables with no luck. 
I tried a pixel 3, as well as a galaxy s8 and they both connected no problem, just seems to be a problem with my phone. 

any ideas? i have developer mode activated and have tried with usb debugging on and off. i tried a factory reset and nothing.
